#summary This page guides how to create new Site pages using our custom page layouts defined within this template.
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/newPage.jpg

= Available Custom layouts =

There are 2 custom page layouts available in this template. They are as follows:
  * Home Page - template for home page of the site (Home)
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/HomePageLayout.jpg

  * Inner Page - template for inner pages (AboutUs, ContactUs, Services, Thanks)
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/InnerPageLayout.jpg
